00049 template <class _Traits> bool mfPlyReader<_Traits>::read(sMesh* malha, const char *filename)
00050 {
00051         MF_ASSERT(filename);
00052         MF_ASSERT(malha);
00053 
00054         ifstream pf(filename);
00055 
00056         if(pf.is_open())
00057         {
00058                 if(! reader(pf, malha))
00059                         return false;
00060 
00061                 pf.close();
00062         }
00063         else
00064                 return false;
00065 
00066         return true;
00067 }

00069 template <class _Traits> bool mfPlyReader<_Traits>::reader(ifstream &pf, sMesh* malha)
00070 {
00071         char auxstr[255];
00072         space coords[3], bin;
00073         sCell cell;
00074         int i, j;
00075         int numVertex, numFace;
00076         int auxvtx[4]; //cell.getNumberVerticesInCell()
00077         int vPropertyJump = -3, idnv;
00078         char c;
00079         
00080         //cout << cell.getDimension()+1 << endl;
00081 
00082         MF_ASSERT(auxstr);
00083 
00084         // Num of vertices
00085         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"vertex") != 0))
00086         {
00087                 pf >> auxstr;
00088         }
00089 
00090         pf >> numVertex;
00091 
00092         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"property") != 0))
00093         {
00094                 pf >> auxstr;
00095         }
00096 
00097         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"property") == 0))
00098         {
00099                 vPropertyJump++;
00100                 pf >> auxstr; //float...
00101                 pf >> auxstr; //id
00102                 pf >> auxstr; //property
00103         }
00104 
00105         // Num of faces
00106         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"face") != 0))
00107         {
00108                 pf >> auxstr;
00109         }
00110 
00111         pf >> numFace;
00112 
00113         while((! pf.eof()) && (strcmp(auxstr,"end_header") != 0))
00114         {
00115                 pf >> auxstr;
00116         }
00117 
00118         if(! pf.eof())
00119         {
00120                 //coords
00121                 for(i = 0; i<numVertex; i++)
00122                 {
00123                         for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00124                         {
00125                                 pf >> coords[j];
00126                                 //cout << j << ": " << coords[j] << endl;
00127                         }
00128 
00129                         for(j = 0; j < vPropertyJump; j++)
00130                         {
00131                                 pf >> bin;
00132                         }
00133 
00134                         malha->addVertex(coords);
00135                 }
00136 
00137                 //faces
00138                 for(i = 0; i<numFace; i++)
00139                 {
00140                         pf >> idnv;
00141                         
00142                         MF_ASSERT(idnv <= 4); //cell.getNumberVerticesInCell()
00143                         //cout << cell.getDimension() << endl;
00144                         
00145                         for(j = 0; j < idnv; j++)
00146                         {
00147                                 pf >> auxvtx[j];
00148                         }
00149                         for(j=idnv; j < 4; j++) //cell.getNumberVerticesInCell()
00150                         {
00151                                 auxvtx[j] = -1;
00152                         }
00153 
00154 //                      if(idnv == 3)
00155 //                      {
00156 //                              auxvtx[3] = -1;
00157 //                      }
00158 
00159                         malha->addCell(auxvtx);
00160                 }
00161         }
00162         else
00163                 return false;
00164 
00165         return true;
00166 }

00189 template <class _Traits> bool mfPlyReader<_Traits>::reader(ifstream &pf, sMesh* malha, int cellDimension)
00190 {
00191         char auxstr[255];
00192         space coords[3], bin;
00193         int i, j;
00194         int numVertex, numFace;
00195         int auxvtx[cellDimension];
00196         int vPropertyJump = -3, faceType;
00197         char c;
00198 
00199         MF_ASSERT(auxstr);
00200 
00201         // Num of vertices
00202         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"vertex") != 0))
00203         {
00204                 pf >> auxstr;
00205                 //cout << "\nValor: " << auxstr;
00206         }
00207 
00208         pf >> numVertex;
00209         //cout << "Num Vertices " << numVertex << endl;
00210 
00211         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"property") != 0))
00212         {
00213                 pf >> auxstr;
00214                 //cout << "\nValor: " << auxstr;
00215         }
00216 
00217         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"property") == 0))
00218         {
00219                 vPropertyJump++;
00220                 pf >> auxstr; //float...
00221                 pf >> auxstr; //id
00222                 pf >> auxstr; //property
00223         }
00224 
00225         // Num of faces
00226         while((! pf.eof())&&(strcmp(auxstr,"face") != 0))
00227         {
00228                 pf >> auxstr;
00229                 //cout << "\nValor: " << auxstr;
00230         }
00231 
00232         pf >> numFace;
00233         //cout << "Num Faces " << numFace << endl;
00234 
00235         while((! pf.eof()) && (strcmp(auxstr,"end_header") != 0))
00236         {
00237                 pf >> auxstr;
00238                 //cout << "\nValor: " << auxstr;
00239         }
00240 
00241         //start reading data
00242         if(! pf.eof())
00243         {
00244                 //coords
00245                 for(i = 0; i<numVertex; i++)
00246                 {
00247                         for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00248                         {
00249                                 pf >> coords[j];
00250                                 //cout << j << ": " << coords[j] << endl;
00251                         }
00252 
00253                         for(j = 0; j < vPropertyJump; j++)
00254                         {
00255                                 pf >> bin;
00256                         }
00257 
00258                         malha->addVertex(coords);
00259                 }
00260                 //faces
00261                 for(i = 0; i<numFace; i++)
00262                 {
00263                         pf >> faceType;
00264                         for(j = 0; j < faceType; j++)
00265                         {
00266                                 pf >> auxvtx[j];
00267                         }
00268 
00269                         if(faceType == 3)
00270                         {
00271                                 auxvtx[3] = -1;
00272                         }
00273 
00274                         malha->addCell(auxvtx);
00275                 }
00276         }
00277         else
00278                 return false;
00279 
00280 
00281         return true;
00282 }
